2164.subject: MLML
2164.descrlong: MLML221:Adv Top Mar Inver-  Advanced considerations of the ecology, physiology, and phylogeny of the various invertebrate phyla emphasizing current literature and research. Topics and emphasis vary from term to term. May be repeated once for credit. Offered through Moss Landing Marine Laboratories (MLML); contact SEP program office for MLML registration procedures. (Offered only as interest warrants.)
